page.description: Remove word(s) from text at position- words delimited by separator.
page.syntax: New_String as C = *WORD_REMOVE(text as c,word as n,separator as c[,nwords as n])

argument.name: New_String
argument.description: The modified text with word(s) removed.

argument.name: word
argument.description: The number of the first word to remove. Numeric

argument.name: nwords
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The number of words to remove. Numeric

page.discussion: The *WORD_REMOVE() function removes one or more words from a list.
